titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on N-Amidino-3,5-diamino-6-chlorpyrazinecarboxamide monohydro-chloride dihydrate.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12244)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on n-amidino-3,5-diamino-6-chloropyrazine-carboxamide monohydrochloride dihydrate (also known as amiloride hydrochloride).
